Tuesday Jan 03 2023.Eddy Lin: Eddy Lin wants to host a collaborative jam session at Oak Hill College on Tuesday from 7 pm to 9 pm. He wants to invite Klaus Mueller and Maria Lopez to play music together. He wants to play the guitar. and he wants Klaus to play the piano and Maria to play the violin. Eddy need to tell Klaus and Maria about the place and time and remind them to bring their instrument.
